articles.title: Homeland Security reportedly sent hundreds of subpoenas seeking to unmask anti-ICE accounts
articles.description: The Department of Homeland Security has been increasing pressure on tech companies to identify the owners of accounts that criticize ICE.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Is safety ‘dead’ at xAI?
articles.description: Elon Musk is “actively” working to make xAI’s Grok chatbot “more unhinged, according to a former employee.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: In a changed VC landscape, this exec is doubling down on overlooked founders
articles.description: As much of Silicon Valley chases mega-rounds and buzzy AI deals, Stacy Brown-Philpot is running Cherryrock Capital like a throwback to venture
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: ‘Clueless’ -inspired app Alta partners with brand Public School to start integrating styling tools into websites
articles.description: This week, Alta unveiled its first integration collaboration, teaming up with Public School, a storied New York City brand.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: Hollywood isn’t happy about the new Seedance 2.0 video generator
articles.description: Hollywood organizations are pushing back against a new AI video model called Seedance 2.0, which they say has quickly become a tool for “blatant”
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Designer Kate Barton teams up with IBM and Fiducia AI for a NYFW presentation
articles.description: Designer Kate Barton teams up with Fiducia AI and IBM for a NYFW presentation.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: India doubles down on state-backed venture capital, approving $1.1B fund
articles.description: India’s $1.1B fund-of-funds will invest through private VCs to support deep-tech and manufacturing startups.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Nothing opens its first retail store in India
articles.description: The two-story location will sell products from Nothing and the more affordable, mass-market brand CMF.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Indian pharmacy chain giant exposed customer data and internal systems
articles.description: A backend flaw in web admin dashboards used by one of India's largest pharmacy chains, exposed thousands of online pharmacy orders.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Airbnb plans to bake in AI features for search, discovery and support
articles.description: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky said the company wants to increase its use of large language models for customer discovery, support and engineering.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
